000000000000_00000_000_11000_0010011  // addi x24,x0,0
000000000100_00000_000_11010_0010011  // addi x26,x0,4
000000000100_00000_000_11100_0010011  // addi x28,x0,4
111111111111_00000_000_01111_0010011  // addi x15,x0,-1
0000001_11100_11010_000_11001_0110011 // mul x25,x26,x28
111111111111_11010_000_11010_0010011  // addi x26,x26,-1
000000000000_11001_010_11011_0000011  // lw x27,0(x25)
0000000_11011_11000_000_11000_0110011 // add x24,x24,x27
0000000_01111_11010_000_01000_1100011 // beq x26, x15, 8
1111111_00000_00000_000_01101_1100011 // beq x0, x0, -20
0000000_11000_00000_010_11100_0100011 // sw x24, 28(x0)
